title: "Watch: Throat-swabbing robot could automate COVID-19 testing"
excerpt: "Mass testing is underway globally to contain the COVID-19 pandemic, and the robots are here to help. Lifeline Robotics, a spin-out of the University of Southern Denmark, has developed a throat-swabbing automaton to scale and improve such testing while also keeping healthcare workers safe."
